main_topic.author: Kaizhao Liang
main_topic.title: Notebook threw exception
main_topic.content: locally on the sample test csv, it runs fine. But submission throws exception without any useful feedback on the error log. shouldn't have been OOM since it's running BS = 1.

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content:
I had a similar error - for me this was what fixed it: 

```
 row.prompt.replace("null", "'null'")
 row.response_a.replace("null", "'null'")
 row.response_b.replace("null", "'null'")

```
comments.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  38th in this Competition

reply.author: Kaizhao LiangTopic Author
reply.content: ah that could be the edge case it was discussing the other threads, let me give it a try thanks!

reply.author: RickPack
reply.content: Please let us know if that worked.
reply.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  1153rd in this Competition

comments.author: jiangli59
comments.content: I also met the same problem. Any update?
comments.date: Posted a month ago  ·  1807th in this Competition

reply.author: jiangli59
reply.content: If you use Llama-8b, I think it may raise this error due to out-of-memory. Sad! So, this error could be the source of oom?
reply.date: Posted a month ago  ·  1807th in this Competition

comments.author: RickPack
comments.content: i experienced similar today with an R notebook. Wondering if the submission needs to be rounded to two decimal places. What a does BS mean?
comments.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  1153rd in this Competition

reply.author: Kaizhao LiangTopic Author
reply.content: It also runs two hours before hitting that error, so clearly some edge cases that have not been exposed. Could be something due to parsing. But the error itself is not helpful for debugging at all.

reply.author: Alex Golubev
reply.content: You can try to take a sample (e.g. 10k) from train and run your script on it. Probably you have a chance to hit the same error. Btw, what is the error message?
reply.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  6th in this Competition
